# 2022 North Dakota Agriculture Commissioner election

Dooley:
| before_election = Doug Goehring
| before_party = Republican
| after_party = Republican
| after_election = Doug Goehring
| title = Agriculture Commissioner
}}
The 2022 North Dakota Agriculture Commissioner election was held on 8 November 2022 in order to elect the Agriculture commissioner of North Dakota. Incumbent Republican Agriculture Commissioner Doug Goehring was re-elected to a fourth term against North Dakota Democratic-NPL Party challenger Fintan L. Dooley.
General election
On election day 8 November 2022, incumbent Agriculture Commissioner Doug Goehring was re-elected to a fourth term by a margin of 120,789 votes against his North Dakota Democratic-NPL Party opponent Fintan L. Dooley. Goehring was sworn in on 1 January 2023.
